Key Match Events: Edwin Diaz allowed a go-ahead grand slam to Corbin Carroll, resulting in an 8-5 loss for the Mets.
Luis Severino struggled in his first game pitching in Arizona, allowing four runs in 4.2 innings.
Eduardo Rodriguez was perfect through four innings for the Diamondbacks.
Harrison Bader hit a 423-foot home run to tie the game for the Mets.
Starling Marte scored the go-ahead run for the Mets in the sixth inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Corbin Carroll's two home runs accounted for five of Arizona's eight runs.
The Mets bullpen performed well in relief of Luis Severino before the eighth inning.
